SELECT
DISTINCT m.`perms`
FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role` r ON ur.`role_id` = r.`id` LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND r.`status` = 0 AND m.`status` = 0

select DISTINCT m.id,m.parent_id,m.menu_name,m.perms,m.component,m.icon,m.path,m.name from sys_user as u left join sys_user_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role as r on ur.role_id = r.id left join sys_role_menu as rm on rm.role_id = r.id left join sys_menu as m on rm.menu_id = m.id where u.id=#{user_id} order by m.id asc
